Dept report: A department-level summary report is generated.
DIG: This department or program has a contact that is able to re-assign Instructors or TAs and opt instructors out on their behalf. This is typically limited to assigning TAs to secondaries.
exclusions: Course codes that should not be evaluated
Reports to Chair: Survey reports are sent to the department chair.
Reports to contact: Survey reports are also sent to the program contact.
Secondaries: This department or program has specific surveys for secondaries (Labs, Seminars, Tutorials). These evaluations are associated with the instructor(s) until the identified contact(s) add TA information to the Blue system.
